name: AMIGA MINER PICO8
description:
This is a small game i have built from a tutorial, The idea is that Jay Miner the ex AMIGA CEO has to save AMIGA Company by getting the more and more amigas and other  amiga objects that fall down on the screen.

There is attached also the source pico8 code if anyone wants to modify it or convert in AMIGA format with Scorpion Engine.

https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html
